text: Vaire is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 June 2016 and consists of the former communes of Vaire-Arcier (the seat) and Vaire-le-Petit.Arrêté préfectoral 12 May 2016 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Vaire
